notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: K.M. performed and described the molecular docking study. E.C. and S.B. developed the concept of the work. E.C. performed experiments, analyzed spectra and wrote the paper. A.D. conducted a study of the biological activity. E.B. and M.K.-T. contributed to the purification of all compounds. P.P. performed and described the molecular dynamics simulations. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
